attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the poor standard of policing in Warwickshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A member of Warwickshire's police authority warned me that our family would be denied justice after two serious crimes had effected our lives. Having experienced at first had the poor service the local police provide which I believe is due to their being unable to properly train their staff because of the small size of the constabulary and the remoteness of our nearest police station. I wish there to be a public enquiry into the future of Law and Order in Warwickshire aimed at dramatically improving the situation in the rural villages possible by merging with a larger police force who are able to deal with serious crimes.
